p: The methanol extract of C. siamea recorded a total tannins content of 1.92 TAE mg −1, higher than the aqueous extract which recorded the tannins content of 0.68 TAE mg −1. Similarly, the total phenolics content recorded by the methanol and aqueous extracts of C. siamea were 49.53 GAE mL −1 and 29.03 GAE mL −1, respectively ( Table 2).
